title: Isn't there a way to auto-notify my email when there's a reply on the forums?
body: Without manually subscribing to my own comments.

replies.body:
Hey there,

As far as I'm aware there's no way to be notified by email when you receive a reply, however there's a handy notification system built into the site.

Simply visit [this url](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/myupdates) to view all updates pertaining to you (Replies to your comments and/or threads)
